contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: The organization known as 'World Tamil Siragam' is headquartered in France.
contact.heading: world Tamil Siragam!
contact.quotes: The sweet Tamil language must be made to spread throughout the world!
contact.quotescontent: We, who come from a culture that nurtured the Tamil language through the Sangam, even if we live away from our homeland, let us all unite, as our ancestors said, and nurture our mother Tamil and the culture of the Tamil people.

event.description: Tamil volunteers living in different countries have come together to form the World Tamil Flag with France as its headquarters.

gallery.title: World Tamil Siragam - Opening Ceremony
gallery.heading: World Tamil Siragam Opening Ceremony!
gallery.p2: Greetings to the lovers of classical Tamil!
gallery.description1: It helps to easily understand the beauty of Tamil, the traditions of culture, and the excellence of literature. Our goal is to enhance the diversity and global status of Tamil.
gallery.description2: The World Tamil House was started to promote the unity of Tamils and to spread the excellence of Tamil culture to the world. Its main objectives are to encourage the development of Tamil language, culture, and arts, and to take actions to protect the welfare of Tamils. Additionally, the World Tamil House aims to establish Tamil unity, highlight the excellence of Tamil culture, safeguard Tamil interests, and create opportunities for the growth of the Tamil language.
gallery.description3: Dear friends, this evening, I feel very happy because I have the responsibility to pay tribute to an important person in our World Tamil House. The achievements, sacrifices, and contributions of Mr. (Name) are exemplary and serve as a model for us. Words are not enough to express our gratitude for the love and recognition Mr. (Name) has given to the Tamil community through his hard work and dedication. We extend our heartfelt thanks to him. He continues to be a strong role model for all of us. Today, we honor him with this special tribute and cash prize. Our heartfelt thanks and best wishes to him. Thank you, everyone.
gallery.description4: Dear friends, I am very happy to speak with you at the end of this event. Today, we spent a very useful and enlightening day. Many thanks! Thanks to everyone who spoke at the event. Your comments provided new insights for all of us. Thanks to all the team members who worked on organizing the event. Your hard work made this event a success. Thank you, everyone.
gallery.carouseltitle2: Statues for those who served Tamil
gallery.carouseldescription1: From the time Tamil emerged until now, and in the future, Tamil books, weekly, and monthly magazines that have been and will be published

structure.bannertitle1: The world Tamil Siragam is lit up!
structure.bannertitle2: Achieve excellence in the unit! - Stay settled!
structure.bannertitle3: Congratulations! The surrounding fame is burning!
structure.subtitle: The purpose of the organization
structure.p: World Tamil Siragam, Paris (France) is a registered international Tamil organization operating globally. It includes Tamil enthusiasts from various countries around the world as its organizers and members.
structure.p1: To unite Tamils living in various countries around the world.
structure.p2: To revive Tamil language, Tamil culture, and Tamil lifestyle among Tamils living worldwide.
structure.p3: To foster the relationship between diaspora Tamils and their homeland, Tamil Nadu.
structure.p4: To provide avenues for understanding their roots in soil, tradition, and worship.
structure.p5: To organize international conferences, seminars, and events focusing on Tamil lifestyle, history, art, culture, values, science, commerce, and economy.
structure.p6: To publish and release books, documents, and other publications on these topics.
structure.p7: To honor and document the ancestors who have served Tamil language and ethnicity appropriately.
structure.p8: To facilitate Tamil language training in necessary countries.
structure.p9: To assist in the educational advancement of poor and underprivileged students.
structure.p10: To establish statues of Tamil scholars/ancestors in various countries around the world.
structure.heading: World Tamil Siragam!

channels.title: Tamil classes begin in Medan, Indonesia
channels.description: Tamil classes started in the city of Medan, Indonesia, by the World Tamil Siragam organization continue to be held every week. Books were provided to help the children of expatriate Tamils learn Tamil easily.
